law.catch_line: Purchase or sale of certain articles by.

text.section:
Sec. 21-6. Purchase or sale of certain articles by.
When unlawful. It shall be unlawful for any person to buy any used or secondhand article from a person under seventeen (17) years of age unless accompanied by a parent or legal guardian, and it shall likewise be unlawful for any person under seventeen (17) years of age to offer for sale any such articles.
Exception. Persons under seventeen (17) years of age lawfully employed as a sales person in any established place of business shall be exempt herefrom.
